name: JumpyBot
description:
This is a game the takes slight inspiration from Jump King in a simpler easier fashion. This game was made in one day.

To mute/unmute the music press m.

To jump use the up arrow.

To move left or right use the other keys.

This was my first platform game ever. I didn't have a clue what to do in the beginning, but I soon overcame that and created something that personally I believe is great. I hope you enjoy.
